  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server​(int serverPort, SetupController controller, int totalAmountOfPlayers, Config.GameDuration gameDuration) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a Server using the NetworkHandler protocol.
      Parameters:
      serverPort - the port as the interface of the server.
      controller - controller of the host
      totalAmountOfPlayers - amount of players (including AI players)
      gameDuration - duration of the game
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the protocol

    • Server

      public Server​(SetupController controller, int totalAmountOfPlayers, Config.GameDuration gameDuration) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a Server using the NetworkHandler protocol.
      Parameters:
      controller - controller of the host
      totalAmountOfPlayers - amount of players (including AI players)
      gameDuration - duration of the game
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the protocol

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      method to start the server. server keeps running until exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • broadcast

      public void broadcast​(DataPackage data)
      Method to send message to all connected clients
      Parameters:
      data - data to send

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      method to stop the server

      public java.lang.String getJoinCode()

    • setAnswer

      public void setAnswer​(DataPackage data)
      Method to answer to the logic
      Parameters:
      data - answer received

    • sendPackage

      public DataPackage sendPackage​(DataPackage dataPackage)
      Method to send a DataPackage to all clients and waiting for a response This method is blocking until an answer is received The first answer received is returned
      Parameters:
      dataPackage - data to send (question)
      Returns:
      data received (answer)
